imageUpload.dragOrClick: Drag and drop or click to upload

historyPicker.title: Select from History
historyPicker.description: Choose an image from your generation history

form.title: Video Generator
form.subtitle: Create Video
form.subtitleDesc: Powered by Google Veo 3.1 - Generate stunning videos with multiple modes
form.modeTextToVideoDesc: Generate video using only text prompts, without reference images.
form.modeReferenceImagesDesc: Upload 1-3 reference images to maintain character/object consistency in the video.
form.modeFirstLastFrameDesc: Define the first and last frames to precisely control video start and end scenes.
form.promptPlaceholder: Describe the video you want to create (e.g., "A cat walking down the street", "Sunset over the ocean")
form.negativePromptPlaceholder: What you don't want to see in the video (e.g., "blurry", "distorted")
form.personGenerationDescription: Control whether people can appear in the video. Note: EU/UK/Switzerland/Middle East regions only allow adult generation.
form.errorReferenceImagesRequired: Please upload at least 1 reference image (maximum 3)
form.errorReferenceImagesIncomplete: Please complete all reference image uploads
form.errorFirstLastFrameRequired: Both first and last frames must be uploaded
form.errorInsufficientCredits: Insufficient credits, please purchase more credits.
form.errorConcurrentLimit: Maximum 3 concurrent tasks allowed, please wait for existing tasks to complete.
form.errorUnknown: Failed to create video generation task

modal.title: Prompt Optimization Results
modal.description: We've analyzed your prompt and generated improved versions
